p!deposit <value>: deposit your $$$ in the bank, so no one can grab them
p!withdraw <value>: if you're risky enough, you can withdraw your $$$ from bank ;)
p!transfer <user> <value>: you can transfer your $$$ to your friend (if you have friends) :^)
p!reset: reset all your progress and start from a scratch
p!play <yt_url>: play some music in vc for your friends
p!leave: use, if you want bot to leave you :(
p!ttt_start: start a tictactoe game in current channel
